name: Milwaukee M18 Compact Right Angle Drill Driver Kit
description: The combination of a 3.75 in. total head length and an integrated Electronic Clutch make the M18 Cordless Lithium-Ion Right Angle Drill the most compact 18-Volt Right Angle Drill Driver in the industry. A 3/8 in. Single Sleeve Keyless Chuck, extended multi-position trigger and up to 125 in. lbs. of torque provide versatility, ease of use and power that is unmatched.3.75 in. head length, great for working in tight spaces3/8 in. single sleeve ratcheting chuck - maximum versatility and gripElectronic clutch - 11 settings + drill mode for complete control in fastening applicationsExtended multi-position handle - provides convenience and versatilityBuilt-in LED's illuminates work surface and indicates clutch outCompatible batteries: compact (48-11-1815), extra capacity (48-11-1828)Compatible chargers: M18/M12 multi-voltage (48-59-1812), M18 AC/DC (2710-20)Includes M18 compact lithium-ion batteryHome Depot Protection Plan:
